    • Constructor Detail

      • FileTreeFactory

        public FileTreeFactory(java.nio.file.Path rootPath,
                       javax.swing.tree.DefaultMutableTreeNode root,
                       Filter filter,
                       java.lang.Boolean thread,
                       java.lang.Boolean hash,
                       java.lang.Boolean recordInCache,
                       int maxDepth)
        Factory initializer
        Parameters:
        rootPath - Path of the root file
        root - The root object of the future FileTree
        filter - The Filter used to restrict files in the Tree
        thread - Boolean, equals true for building the FileTree using threads (increase required resources)
        hash - Boolean equals to True if the factory should hash files
        recordInCache - Boolean equals to True if the factory should use the cache
        maxDepth - Integer equivalent to the max depth of the tree that you want to build
